translation.en: "You're... a... b-b...
big... g... girl... now."
[woman] Marcy?
I gotta leave early tonight. You all right alone?
I'm... I'm fine.
Don't forget to take your break. You work too hard.
translation.ko: 좀 쉬어 넌 너무 열심히 해

translation.en: I won't. I won't.
Bye, Tory.
-[slapping glass] -Don't!
David gave that to me! David gave that to me!
translation.ko: 데이비드가 준 거야! 데이비드가 준 거라고!

translation.en: -David-- -[grunts]
Aah!
That's mine.
Holy shit.
[man] Trevor. You stay down, man. He's better than you.
translation.ko: 트레버, 일어나지 마 쟤가 더 잘해

translation.en: -You can stay down, man! -Shut up!
You should've stayed down.
Trevor! Trevor!
I concede the fight.
-Do we need to cut it? -Nah.
It's okay. It's okay. It's almost ready.
[man] Carly?
Carly? [Carly] You're not coming in like that.
You promised, Jeff.
[Jeff] Come on, Carly. Don't make me mad. I gotta take a piss.
translation.ko: 열 받게 하지 마, 칼리 오줌 마려워!

translation.en: Not supposed to be here when you drink.
-[Jeff] Why is he crying? -He's just hungry.
Give him something to eat! I'm warming it up.
What is this shit?
It's baby food. He's a baby, Jeff.
[Jeff] Don't talk to me like I'm an idiot.
[Jeff] This is bullshit. Yo, come on!
Hey, all you're doing is pissing me off!
[Jeff] Listen, I'm sorry. You make me crazy.
You need to go.
[Jeff] All right. I'm going.
"Ruok"?
translation.ko: "발신자 - 르네 벨라미 R U Ok, 자기?"

translation.en: "Ru-ok"?
"Ruok..."
[mom] You're up early.
-[kissing] -The headache wake you? The sound of birds.
[dad] Know how stupid it is to pick a fight before a game?
How do you throw a football with a broken hand?
[mom] Doctors are more concerned with his concussion.
[dad] You blow your chance at a scholarship,
you better start learning to flip burgers.
translation.ko: - 햄버거나 뒤집을 각오 해라 - 적당히 해

translation.en: All right. You scoot upstairs. Get ready.
translation.ko: - 햄버거나 뒤집을 각오 해라 - 적당히 해 올라가서 준비해 아침에 다시 진찰해야 한대

translation.en: They wanted to see you again in the morning.
translation.ko: 올라가서 준비해 아침에 다시 진찰해야 한대

translation.en: Thank you, Mom.
"Thank you, Mom"?
Who the hell's that?
[man] Philip Pearson?
Tried to find you at the university. I'm Detective Gower.
"Gower"? [Gower] Your roommate passed away last night.
You don't seem surprised.
[man] It's me.
[Marcy] David? [David] Yeah.
Oh! That's... not appropriate.
Marcy, put some clothes on.
Yeah, I can't, uh... be your boyfriend, Marcy, w-we talked about this.
translation.ko: 난 너랑 못 사귀어, 마시 이미 얘기했잖아

translation.en: What's that?
What happened?
[Marcy] Uh... I fell. [David] And you just went home?
Oh, kiddo, are you okay? Does it hurt?
I'm fine.
[David] Well, I know going to the doctor's
not your favorite thing in the world, but...
That's a-- That's a nasty cut.
Is this appropriate?
Appropriate? Sure.
[stammers] Maybe some underwear.
[Gower] So you skipped out? [Philip] I just walked.
And the loaded syringe we found on the table, that wasn't meant for you?
translation.ko: 탁자에 있던 주사기는 당신 몫 아닙니까?

translation.en: Uh, what difference does it make?
Did Stephen inject himself, or did you do it for him?
translation.ko: 그럼 뭐가 달라지나요? 스티븐이 직접 주사했나요? 아니면 당신이 해줬어요?

translation.en: Because your prints were found on both syringes.
translation.ko: 주사기 두 개에서 당신 지문이 나왔거든요

translation.en: I was there, but then I-I left.
Yeah...
because you knew he was gonna O.D.
translation.ko: 스티븐이 과다 복용으로 죽을 줄 알았으니까요

translation.en: Yeah, you knew.
You know, a phone call to 911 could've saved his life.
That's cold, Philip.
Either way, you have got a problem.
On top of your drug problem.
[Philip] I don't have a drug problem.
[Gower] I know who your dealer is.
translation.ko: 마약 문제 없는데요 어느 마약상에게 매주 얼마나 사는지 알고

translation.en: I know how much you buy.
translation.ko: 어느 마약상에게 매주 얼마나 사는지 알고

translation.en: I know who your friends are and where you're from.
translation.ko: 어느 마약상에게 매주 얼마나 사는지 알고 당신 친구들과 당신 출신도 알아요

translation.en: You have no idea where I'm from.
translation.ko: 내가 어디서 왔는지 당신은 절대 몰라요

translation.en: You inject somebody, they O.D., that's manslaughter.
I have the right to court-appointed legal counsel, yes?
Sure you don't want to call your parents instead?
You think you're sick now, wait till your lawyer shows up.
translation.ko: 네가 잘난 것 같지? 변호사 오면 보자고

translation.en: [David] I'm proud of you, you know.
What? What for?
You got knocked in the head last night, and you're...
you know, the naked thing, that-- that was weird,
but otherwise, you're handling this amazingly well.
translation.ko: 발가벗은 건 이상했지만 그것만 빼면 의연하게 대처하고 있잖아

translation.en: Hey, it's Thursday.
It's reading-aloud day.
There's no point in wasting time sitting on a bus.
It's just me. It can be anything at all.
Think I got your favorite.
"Police were forced to use tear gas to disperse a crowd
shortly after a not-guilty verdict
What?
What-- What's wrong?
You didn't answer your cell.
What did they say? I have a concussion.
Oh, no.
Will you be able to play in the game next week?
translation.ko: 어떡해... 다음 주 경기 뛸 수 있어?

translation.en: The doctor said that...
if I hadn't walked away from the fight, I might have died.
Does it hurt now? A little.
Are your folks home? No. Why?
Oh, I don't think that we should, Rene, 'cause my concussion.
translation.ko: 뇌진탕 때문에 안 될 것 같아, 르네

translation.en: Let me make you feel better.
Look. Please, stop.
-I don't think that we should. -Are you breaking up with me?
translation.ko: 하면 안 될 것 같아 - 날 차는 거야? - 아니!

translation.en: No!
If anything... I want to be closer to you.
There are things I don't remember. Things about me?
It's more things about myself.
The doctor said that a concussion as bad as this
can cause changes in personality and memory loss,
that the only treatment is time-- that in time I'll be the person I was before the concussion.
translation.ko: 원래 모습으로 돌아가려면 시간이 유일한 약이래

translation.en: I need you to help me remember who that person is.
Y-You want me to help you find yourself?
Trev... That is so beautiful.
[Trevor] Look...
You should go. [Rene] I don't want to, but I will.
That's how much I love you.
Daddy's coming.
You busy right now?
Not yet. We just got sent a red flag.
Can't you handle it? I'm all over Jonas Walker.
translation.ko: 네가 해결해 난 조나스 워커 맡았잖아

translation.en: [Forbes] I'm in court today and tomorrow.
[MacLaren] What's the flag? Potential cell.
Encrypted communication in the deep web.
I have no idea what I'm looking at.
Analyst who flagged it is hoping that they're just gamers.
Who travel, apparently.
[Forbes] Those GPS coordinates correspond to an abandoned building downtown. [MacLaren] And what's a "T.E.L.L."?
translation.ko: 그 GPS 좌표들은 시내의 버려진 건물이야

translation.en: [Forbes] I asked the same question. They ran it and nothing showed up.
Aw, shit, I'm late.
It's probably nothing, but...
Yeah, yeah. I got it. I'll let you know.
Have fun in court.
[Forbes] Make sure Jonas Walker doesn't shoot anyone while I'm gone.
translation.ko: 나 없는 동안 조나스 워커가 총 못 쏘게 해

translation.en: You didn't coach her?
translation.ko: "언어 병리학자 리 박사" - 당신이 안 가르쳤어요? - 저게 가르친다고 되나요?

translation.en: No amount of coaching can do that.
translation.ko: - 당신이 안 가르쳤어요? - 저게 가르친다고 되나요?

translation.en: Marcy has a significant intellectual disability.
translation.ko: 알다시피 마시는 현저한 지적 장애가 있어요

translation.en: Yeah. "Had."
You want to think something wonderful's happened,
but no traumatic brain injury is going to increase intellectual capacity.
translation.ko: 외상성 뇌 손상에 지적 능력이 늘지는 않아요

translation.en: It's just not possible. Which brings us back to "miracle."
[doctor] Assuming that there was a traumatic injury, likely a concussion,
translation.ko: 뇌진탕 같은 외상성 뇌 손상이 있었다면

translation.en: the most common symptoms would be memory loss, change in personality--
translation.ko: 기억 상실이나 성격 변화가 일반적인 증상이죠

translation.en: So... What if this is the real Marcy?
Seriously?
Up until the age of 18, Marcy lived in an institution,
one with a reputation for neglect and abuse,
translation.ko: 마시가 18살 때까지 지냈던 시설은 폐쇄 직전까지 아이들을 방치하고 학대했어요

translation.en: right up until the time it was shut down.
translation.ko: 폐쇄 직전까지 아이들을 방치하고 학대했어요 마시는 그런 말 없던데요

translation.en: She doesn't talk about that.
[doctor] Maybe the "Marcy" we knew was her way of coping there,
her way of making people look after her,
and she just continued that behavior after her release, and when she hit her head...
translation.ko: 퇴소 후에도 그렇게 굴다가 머리를 부딪쳐서...

translation.en: She just forgot who she was pretending to be? That's crazy.
translation.ko: 연기하는 걸 잊었다고요? 말도 안 돼요!

translation.en: [doctor] It's infinitely more possible than her I.Q. doubling overnight.
translation.ko: 밤새 IQ가 배가된 것보다야 훨씬 현실적이죠

translation.en: I've been her caseworker since her release.
-That was over a year ago! -My case in point.
translation.ko: 마시가 퇴소하고 1년 넘게 사회복지사로서 지켜봤어요! 제 말이 그거예요

translation.en: You got her a subsidized apartment,
translation.ko: 제 말이 그거예요 정부 보조 아파트를 구해주고 도서관에 취직도 시켜주고

translation.en: a job at the library.
translation.ko: 정부 보조 아파트를 구해주고 도서관에 취직도 시켜주고

translation.en: You see her four or five times a week--
translation.ko: 정부 보조 아파트를 구해주고 도서관에 취직도 시켜주고 - 매주 4-5번 만나니... - 날 갖고 놀았다고요?

translation.en: You're saying she played me?
The most innocent soul I've ever met.
Played the system. Fooled me, too.
So she could live in a flophouse full of crackheads,
work nights at a library for the rest of her adult life?
No, you're right. She's a mastermind. She's a James Bond villain.
translation.ko: 네, 마시는 천재네요 007 영화 악당 수준이죠

translation.en: [doctor] Neural pathways can't spring up overnight. Vocabulary doesn't come out of nowhere.
translation.ko: 하룻밤 사이 신경이 발달하거나 어휘력이 늘지는 않아요

translation.en: And what's happened to her stutter?
Is something wrong?
[straining to read] "You're... a...
big...
girl... now,"
said... Mary...
Tee-- Teacher.
-[panting] -[woman] Good.
[doctor] Do you remember that?
It was just a few months ago.
I don't understand. [doctor] Neither do we.
I'd like to find out what else you don't remember.
It's okay... I'm here.
[doctor] Let's start with yesterday.
Where were you?
At the library.
Good.
[doctor] What did you do at the library?
I'm a librarian, so I was...
translation.ko: - 도서관에서 뭐 했어? - 전 사서예요 그래서... 그럼 도서 출납을 관리하고 이용객들을 도왔니?

translation.en: So you were checking books in and out, helping folks find what they were looking for?
translation.ko: 그럼 도서 출납을 관리하고 이용객들을 도왔니?

translation.en: Yes.
[doctor] And can you name one of those people?
David.
Uh, to do research. He's a reporter.
Marcy, stop.
What's wrong?
You being a librarian,
me going there to do research for a newspaper I work for--
translation.ko: 네가 도서관 사서이고 내가 취재 때문에 너희 도서관에 간다고?

translation.en: those are all part of a profile page that we made up.
That's my profile. We created it as an exercise...
translation.ko: - 내 프로필인데요 - 연습 삼아 같이 만들었지

translation.en: so I could teach you about social media
and other things about the world.
Remember?
You're not a librarian. You work there as a cleaning lady.
I'm not a reporter.
I'm your social worker.
So... so what... you're saying is... that--
translation.ko: 그러니까 - 그 말씀은... - 무슨 영문인가 싶다

translation.en: We're just trying to understand.
[doctor] Marcy?
Take it you're not "Leticia."
Wrong file.
Go ahead, have a seat.
Sit.
You look like shit, Philip. When was the last time you hit?
-I don't use drugs. -Come on, man.
You don't have to pretend. I know all about addiction.
translation.ko: 중독은 훤히 꿰고 있으니 내숭 떨지 마라

translation.en: Trust me. Mine's just legal.
Have they talked to you at all about the methadone program they got going on?
-What is it? -Methadone?
[Philip] Your addiction.
Is it gambling?
Cigarettes.
Look, I'm just trying to be simpatico here. Don't be a dick.
I apologize.
We're gonna plea. You'll end up doing some time. There's no way around that.
translation.ko: 항변은 하겠지만 형을 피할 수는 없어

translation.en: They got you two ways, all right?
But, in the meantime-- Are you bound by attorney-client privilege?
Can you guarantee your confidence
if I tell you information that can help us both?
Absolutely. What?
I'm so sorry.
Come on, you love... You love making up after we fight.
translation.ko: 자기는 싸우고 나서... 꼭 화해해야 하잖아

translation.en: That wasn't a fight. You struck me.
If I hadn't demanded you leave, you would've struck me again.
translation.ko: 내가 안 쫓아냈으면 또 때렸을 테고

translation.en: From now on, you'll be allowed to see your son once a day
translation.ko: 이제 당신 아들은 하루에 한 시간씩 봐

translation.en: for one hour, time to be arranged.
translation.ko: 이제 당신 아들은 하루에 한 시간씩 봐 - 시간은 따로 정하자 - 보고 싶을 때 볼 거야

translation.en: I see him when I wanna see him.
translation.ko: - 시간은 따로 정하자 - 보고 싶을 때 볼 거야

translation.en: Also, you'll provide proper financial support.
Okay. Okay, okay. I get it.
Let me make it up to you.
What do you want me to do?
Change Jeffrey's diaper.
Hey! Phil!
You got out quick. What'd they tell you?
They didn't say anything. They just let me go.
Come here, come here. Come here for a sec.
How did you know?
Come on, man. Three horses? Three races, three different cities--
translation.ko: 세 도시에서 열린 경마의 우승마들을 맞추고

translation.en: all 20 to one or better?
The bets were so stupid, I had to go to three bookies.
translation.ko: 하도 황당한 도박이라 브로커 세 명을 찾아갔다

translation.en: I wouldn't have done it if you hadn't fronted the cash advance.
translation.ko: 네가 현금 서비스로 돈 빌려줘서 한 거야

translation.en: It's all here, by the way, with interest. Credit card's in there.
translation.ko: 이자 포함해서 전부 넣었다 네 카드도 있고

translation.en: Go ahead. Take it. Come on, come on.
You gotta tell me.
Do I still have attorney-client privilege? Yeah, sure, whatever. Yep. Yep.
I'm from the future.
Okay, I get it, you can't tell me.
But Phil... you're gonna need me.
translation.ko: 그래, 말 못 하는구나 필립, 넌 내가 필요할 거야

translation.en: The cops are gonna be all over you.
translation.ko: 필립, 넌 내가 필요할 거야 경찰이 널 물고 늘어질 테니 우린 서로 도와야 해

translation.en: We gotta look after each other here. All right?
translation.ko: 경찰이 널 물고 늘어질 테니 우린 서로 도와야 해

translation.en: Oh, speaking of which--
There's something extra in there for you, from the lock-up.
translation.ko: 그 안에 널 위한 작은 선물이 있다

translation.en: Just a little taste so you don't get sick.
David?
There she is.
What happened?
[David] Dr. Lee says you had a seizure.
It's the diminished capacity. There's too much pre-existing damage.
translation.ko: 이미 뇌 손상이 커서 기능이 저하된 거예요

translation.en: What?
How did I get--? We had to take you to the hospital.
You've been out of it all day.
Soon as you feel up to it, they wanna run tests--
translation.ko: 네가 기운 차리면 몇 가지 검사하겠대

translation.en: -No, please. -It's not up to me.
translation.ko: - 안 돼요 - 나도 어쩔 수 없어

translation.en: I can't be in the hospital.
-[David] Marcy. -Listen to me.
I have important work to do. At the library?
No, not at the library.
This is all happening for a reason.
Okay. How about I go get the doctor and we can talk about this?
translation.ko: 좋아, 의사를 불러올 테니 같이 얘기할까?

translation.en: Thank you. [David] Okay.
-Forbes. -[MacLaren] Hey.
How's Judge What's-His-Nuts?
Still an asshole. How's our potential shooter?
translation.ko: - 그 판사는 어때? - 여전히 미친놈이야 - 잠재적 총기 난사범은? - 워커는 일주일째 집에 있어

translation.en: Jonas Walker hasn't left his house in a week.
translation.ko: - 잠재적 총기 난사범은? - 워커는 일주일째 집에 있어

translation.en: Starting to think we're wasting our time on that one.
Our chatroom, on the other hand, has been filling up all day with the same weird messages.
translation.ko: 반면 우리 채팅방에는 종일 이상한 메시지가 반복돼

translation.en: I.P.s all over town.
You think it's something? Gotta admit, it's making me curious.
The one who set up the chatroom was arrested and released on a technicality.
Might save time if you contact the arresting officer.
Name's Gower.
Okay. Bright and early.
Marcy, what're you doing here?
I was at your apartment! I've been worried!
I didn't know where else to go.
translation.ko: 네 아파트에 있었어 얼마나 걱정했다고! 달리 갈 곳이 없어서요

translation.en: What is going on?
Tell me. I can't.
A mistake's been made, and I'm not sure how to correct it.
I don't even know if it can be.
Just... know that I'm playing a small part in something that's important.
translation.ko: 그저 중요한 일의 작은 역할을 맡았다고 해두죠

translation.en: Well, what does that even mean? [Marcy] I couldn't explain it if I tried.
translation.ko: - 그게 무슨 뜻이야? - 어차피 설명 못 해요

translation.en: Please... just trust me anyway.
[MacLaren] Morning. Sorry to bother you so early.
I'm Special Agent Grant MacLaren with the FBI.
FBI? Really?
Really.
A message was sent from this I.P. address--
that just means one of the computers in your house-- kinda raised a flag in our system.
translation.ko: 댁의 컴퓨터 한 대가 우리 시스템에 걸린 셈이죠

translation.en: Please tell me this is not about Internet porn.
No. Not porn. At least, I-I don't think so.
No, this is more of a chatroom conversation.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 포르노는 아닌 것 같습니다 채팅방 대화 문제랍니다

translation.en: Ah. My son's always in those rooms.
translation.ko: 채팅방 대화 문제랍니다 아들이 항상 그런 곳에 접속해요

translation.en: Is he a gamer, by any chance? Video games?
[mom] It's all he ever does.
That, and the other thing.
translation.ko: 맨날 그 짓만 해요 그거랑 다른 짓도...

translation.en: When do you expect him home?
[mom] Said he'd be out late tonight with friends.
Is he in any kind of trouble?
Nah. I doubt it. You have a good day.
[male student] Hey. What're you doing here? What do you mean?
to stay home for the rest of the year.
translation.ko: 학기 끝날 때까지 집에 있어도 되잖아

translation.en: And fail to graduate? Yeah, like that was gonna happen!
Can I ask you something without telling everyone?
-Yeah. -Honestly?
-Yeah, God, what is it? -Which locker is mine?
translation.ko: 그래, 뭔데 그래? 내 사물함 어디야?

translation.en: You mean you got, like, brain damage?
Post-concussion syndrome.
It's, uh... it's right here.
You want me to show you the combo? Please.
[Marcy] Why is this body always so tired?
"This body"? Well, maybe 'cause it works nights.
This body just made breakfast.
That's very kind.
And you're naked again.
Okay. How about you get dressed before joining me?
translation.ko: 좋아, 일단 옷부터 입고 밥 먹을까?

translation.en: David?
If I could tell you, I would.
Hey, as long as you're not an assassin or a Hollywood actress researching a character.
translation.ko: 암살자나 배역 연구 중인 영화배우만 아니라면야...

translation.en: Those-- Those are the... two worst-case scenarios I came up with while I was laying awake all night.
[Detective Gower, over phone] Gower. Morning. Grant MacLaren, FBI.
I'm investigating a 20-year-old male you booked yesterday--
translation.ko: - 가워입니다 - FBI 매클래런 요원입니다 어제 조사한 20세 남성을 수사 중인데요

translation.en: -Philip Pearson, yeah. -That's him.
Well, I guess you heard he won the lottery yesterday, huh?
-You had to drop the charges? -No, he won the fucking lottery.
Six numbers outta seven. 92-grand and change.
Lucky kid.
Not if I catch him with that bag of smack he's walking around with.
translation.ko: 마약 들고 다니다가 나한테 걸리면 끝이죠

translation.en: Our system red-flagged him as a potential member of a terrorist cell.
translation.ko: 우리 시스템이 필립을 잠재적 테러범으로 지목했는데

translation.en: I got the rest of the suspects covered, but if you could watch this one--
translation.ko: 나머지 용의자는 제가 맡았으니 그 녀석만 감시해 주시면...

translation.en: Agent MacLaren, there's no way in hell this kid's a terrorist.
translation.ko: 매클래런 요원님 그 애는 테러범일 리 없어요

translation.en: Yeah? What were the odds he was gonna win the lottery?
[sighs] Okay. Keep this number and check in with me later.
Tomorrow, he's all yours.
Mm! You like that, sweetie?
Yes?
Special Agent MacLaren of the FBI.
-Sorry to bother you. -"MacLaren"?
translation.ko: 방해해서 죄송합니다 매클래런 씨! 무슨 일이신가요?

translation.en: How can I help you?
Our computer spits stuff out, we have to follow it up.
translation.ko: 가끔 컴퓨터가 내뱉는 정보를 조사해야 하거든요

translation.en: -Do you live here alone? -With my son.
-How old is he? -Just over a year.
So, no criminal record?
Sorry.
I probably know the answer to this,
translation.ko: 죄송합니다 이미 대답은 알 것 같지만

translation.en: but do you have plans for later tonight downtown?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 시내에 나갈 계획 없으시죠?

translation.en: No. No plans.
You don't sound very sure.
I was trying to decide if you were asking me out.
Me? I'm-- I'm busy tonight.
Thanks for your time.
[Gower] Hey! Pearson!
I wonder how much smack you can buy with 90 grand.
translation.ko: 9만 달러면 약을 얼마나 살 수 있지?

translation.en: The money's for something else.
Save me the trouble of following you and just tell me.
translation.ko: 그냥 말해주면 널 안 따라다녀도 될 텐데!

translation.en: I'm financing a secret hideout.
Sorry, kid, you're gonna have to do better than that.
[David] You're welcome to stay while I'm at work.
translation.ko: 내가 일할 동안 집에 있어도 돼

translation.en: -There's nothing in the fridge-- -I'll be out before you're home.
translation.ko: - 냉장고가 비어서 돈을... - 퇴근 전에 나갈게요

translation.en: I'd like to come back tonight, if that's all right.
translation.ko: 괜찮다면 오늘 밤에 다시 오고 싶어요

translation.en: It'll be late, though.
I could come with you.
No. No, you should stay home tonight.
translation.ko: - 같이 나가자 - 아니에요 오늘 밤엔 집에 있어요

translation.en: The streets won't be safe.
Wh-- What? What's gonna happen?
Oh, come on, that's going too far.
-I shouldn't have said anything. -You can't expect me to--
translation.ko: - 너무하잖아! - 괜한 말을 했네요 아무 말도 없이...

translation.en: [Marcy] I'll be back just after midnight.
You're Batgirl, aren't you?
Bye.
-[siren chirps] -Shit!
Come here.
You're welcome.
Get in. Let's go. Come on.
Had to pay a kid to dare a kid to get Gower off your ass.
Watching your back's getting expensive, Philip. -What do you want in return? -Today's bet.
translation.ko: - 너 때문에 돈이 많이 드네 - 대가로 뭘 원하죠?

translation.en: I can't do it.
Yesterday, you gave me three. I'm only asking for one.
translation.ko: 어제는 세 경기 알려줬잖아 하나만 부탁하자!

translation.en: Yesterday was an emergency. Today's kind of an emergency for me.
translation.ko: - 어제는 긴급 상황이었죠 - 오늘은 내가 좀 급해

translation.en: Then you are a very bad gambler.
Yeah, I'm a bad gambler...
Maybe you'd like to think about it. Get out.
[Gower] Pearson! Come here!
-Where are you going? -Out.
With that guy?
I don't have time for this. Well, make time.
Okay! Damn it. Last warning.
Okay.
Hey! Hey!
Pearson! Stop!
Come on! Stop!
It's a good thing you stopped, kiddo.
If I had to climb that fence, I was gonna have a heart attack.
translation.ko: 난 그 담 넘으면 심장마비 올 거야

translation.en: You're having one right now. [Gower] Oh, shut up.
I just need to catch my breath, that's all.
translation.ko: - 지금 심장마비 왔잖아요 - 닥쳐 그저 숨만 돌리면 돼

translation.en: Maybe you're right. My phone-- it's in the car.
-Help me. -I can't, Mr. Gower.
[Gower] Then find someone with a phone!
I can't, I'm sorry. [Gower] You can. I won't come after you, I promise.
translation.ko: - 죄송하지만 그럴 순 없어요 - 이제 안 따라다닐게

translation.en: You're supposed to die this afternoon. [Gower] No, you don't know--
translation.ko: - 오늘 오후에 죽어야 해요 - 그걸 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: I knew the moment that I heard your name.
-I just didn't know I'd be here. -Call 911 and go!
translation.ko: - 내 앞에서 죽을 줄은... - 구급차 불러!

translation.en: Because we considered you as a host.
The heart attack was inevitable within days.
No... I'm okay.
I think I'm okay.
Hello?
-[MacLaren] David Mailer? -Yeah?
Special Agent Grant MacLaren with the FBI.
I came by earlier, left a card under your door.
Oh, sorry, I didn't, uh...
-I didn't see it. -Not a problem.
translation.ko: 죄송한데... 못 봤네요 괜찮습니다 어젯밤 귀하 IP로

translation.en: Just following up on a chatroom message
that was sent from your I.P. address last night.
You mean my computer?
Right. Tell me, do you have plans to meet anyone tonight
translation.ko: - 제 컴퓨터요? - 네 오늘 밤 약속 있으세요?

translation.en: downtown, on the 12th floor of an abandoned building, about 11:17?
No. Why-- Why would I do that?
I guess that means I won't be seeing you there.
I'm just thinking out loud, but sometimes I let neighbors use my Wi-Fi. Maybe that's, um--
translation.ko: 생각해 보니 가끔 이웃들이 제 와이파이를 쓰는데

translation.en: Well, that's a federal offense, Mr. Mailer.
Is it?
No. I'm kidding. Have a good evening.
No. I'm not pressing charges. I just want to know where she took it.
translation.ko: 고발하는 게 아니라 어디로 몰고 갔나 궁금하다고

translation.en: Well, just check and keep your mouth shut.
All right. Thanks.
Hello?
I'm-- I'm trying to reach Detective Gower. I thought this was his--
Jesus, I'm sorry to hear that.
No, it's-it's not important. Um, thank you.
Carly?
Carly?
Got you.
You're actually all here.
[Carly] We've been waiting for you. [MacLaren] Uh-huh.
Where's the social worker?
-David isn't one of us. -One of--?
We're travelers from the future, Agent MacLaren.
[Marcy] In our time, many years from now, humanity's been all but wiped out.
translation.ko: 먼 미래의 우리 시대에 인류는 거의 전멸했어요

translation.en: We've come back to change that.
There are thousands of travelers already here taking part.
translation.ko: 이미 수천 명의 여행자가 임무 수행 중이에요

translation.en: Okay, what do you say we, uh, travel downstairs
and talk about this somewhere else? It's not safe here.
60 seconds. Till what?
[Philip] In the future, we've developed a technology
that allows a traveler to project his or her conscious mind into a host body
translation.ko: 미래에 개발된 기술로 여행자의 의식을 숙주의 신체에 투영할 수 있어요

translation.en: by knowing the precise time, elevation, latitude, and longitude of their death.
translation.ko: 정확한 사망 시각과 고도, 위도, 경도만 알면요

translation.en: [MacLaren] "T.E.L.L."
[Marcy] A Traveler's consciousness arrives moments before that historical time of death,
translation.ko: 여행자의 의식은 사망 시각 직전에 도착해서

translation.en: overriding the original host's mind,
then resumes his or her life by using their knowledge
translation.ko: 그들의 삶을 이어가면서 지식과 역사 기록 소셜 미디어를 이용하죠

translation.en: of historical records and social media.
translation.ko: 지식과 역사 기록 소셜 미디어를 이용하죠

translation.en: Okay, that's enough bullshit for now--
-30 seconds. -Wait.
Who the hell is that?
That's the body of Jonas Walker.
We stopped him from going on a shooting rampage,
as you tried and failed to do, between 11:14 and 11:17.
[Trevor] 20 seconds.
[Carly] We know the events of tonight because for us, they've already happened.
translation.ko: 우리에게 오늘 밤은 과거의 일이라 아는 거예요

translation.en: Just as we know during a blackout,
translation.ko: 예를 들어 오늘 밤 11시 17분 정전 중에

translation.en: at 11:17, in pursuit of Jonas Walker,
translation.ko: 예를 들어 오늘 밤 11시 17분 정전 중에 특수요원 그랜트 매클래런은 조나스 워커를 쫓다가

translation.en: Special Agent Grant MacLaren
translation.ko: 특수요원 그랜트 매클래런은 조나스 워커를 쫓다가

translation.en: fell 45 meters down an open elevator shaft to his death.
Three seconds.
I see we all made it.
Let's begin.
